summary: ABS LIGHT ILLUMINATES INTERMITTENTLY.  TOOK VEHICLE IN TO DEALER FOR REPAIR.  PROBLEM STILL EXITS.  LEFT REAR TIRE SPEED SENSOR FAILED CAUSING PROBLEMS WITH ABS SYSTEM, CAUSING TIRE TO BLOW OUT. RESULTING IN LEFT REAR WHEEL/RIM TO BE COMPLETELY SHATTERED INTO PIECES.  ALSO BRAKES AND CALIPERS TOTALLY DAMAGED.  BRAKES ARE NOT SAFE OR RELIABLE.  REAR,FIFTH DOOR HAS HINGE AND SECURE LOCKING PROBLEMS.  MAJOR RUSTING ON VEHICLE.
